control.title: este es el titulo
control.description: Control para graficar las diferencias entre x e y
control.datasource: select 'Jan' as mes , 'Section1' as seccion, 10 as Value union select 'Feb' as mes , 'Section1' as seccion, 30 as Value union select 'Mar' as mes , 'Section1' as seccion, 20 as Value UNION select 'Jan' as mes , 'Section2' as seccion, 200 as Value union select 'Feb' as mes , 'Section2' as seccion, 50 as Value union select 'Mar' as mes , 'Section2' as seccion, 10 as Value UNION select 'Jan' as mes , 'Section3' as seccion, 80 as Value union select 'Feb' as mes , 'Section3' as seccion, 80 as Value union select 'Mar' as mes , 'Section3' as seccion, 100 as Value

detail.datasourse: SELECT NumMaster, FechaMaster, C.Descripcion as 'agente', D.Descripcion as 'naviera', E.Descripcion as 'nave', Viaje, NumHousesBL, FechaETA, AperturaNavieras as AperturaNavieras_GREEN, PlazoEmbarcadores, g.NombreUsuario as 'usuario1', h.NombreUsuario as 'usuario2', F.Descripcion as 'Estado' FROM PAPERLESS_ASIGNACION A LEFT OUTER JOIN PAPERLESS_USUARIO2_PASOS_ESTADO B ON A.id=B.idAsignacion LEFT OUTER JOIN PAPERLESS_AGENTE C ON A.IdAgente=C.Id LEFT OUTER JOIN PAPERLESS_NAVIERA D ON A.IdNaviera = D.Id LEFT OUTER JOIN PAPERLESS_NAVE E ON A.IdNave = E.Id LEFT OUTER JOIN PAPERLESS_ESTADO F ON A.IdEstado = F.Id LEFT OUTER JOIN USUARIOS G ON A.Usuario1 = G.Id LEFT OUTER JOIN USUARIOS H ON A.Usuario2 = H.Id WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),A.aperturanavieras,112) < CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),GETDATE(),112) AND B.NumPaso=4 AND B.fechamarca IS NULL ORDER BY AperturaNavieras ASC
